roller.description: Roller skating is the perfect way to combine fitness with fun. It helps people develop a fitness habit with a sport thatâ€™s enjoyable for all ages. Here are the top 10 health benefits of roller skating: 1.Easy on the joints; 2.Great as a cross training exercise; 3.Calorie burning (fat burning); 4.Good for mood; 5.Works the arms and legs; 6.Great for improving balance, agility and coordination; 7.Strengthen the heart; 8.Improve endurance; 9.Can be done anywhere; 10.Social.
roller.inventation: Join our team. We gather at Rynok Square every Saturday on 18:00. Let's skate together
